dashboards.name: customer
dashboards.description: NM & BG Customer related dashboards & metrics like Client Advisor relationships, Customer Trips, Customer Segmentation & Sales

children.description: Sales performance by customer segmentation. Filterable by Channel, Price Type, Sales Type, Division, and Time Frame.
Demographics and sales data for Active customers (L12M) filterable by customer segmentation or by demographics.
New customers acquired online.  Tracks sales, repurchase rates, acquisition channel, and customer segmentation.
Private promotions performance measuring Test group against Control group with sales incrementality and redemption rates.
Sales performance by new and existing customers.  Filterable by Channel, Price Type, Sales Type, Division, and Time Frame.
VVIC/VIC customers from FY23, compares segment sales performance YTD to LY, sales detail for customers.
Tracks retention rates for top segments and for channel.

children.childDisplayName: BGB - FY23 BG Business Performance Dashboard
children.description: Archived Performance Dashboard. Price type of Non-Reg is broken out into reg promo/clearance in current version.

children.childDisplayName: BGB - FY 23 BGO New Customer - Repurchase Rates
children.description: New customers acquired online in FY23.  Tracks sales, repurchase rates, acquisition channel, and customer segmentation.
Scores BG level customer spend and BGB/BGS/BGO level spend band performance. Sales&Trips by Customer Spend Band broken down by Channel/Div/Price Type(12mo History & LY/FY19 comps).

dashboards.name: web-operations
dashboards.description: All the eCommerce, Digital selling, Acquisition & Growth, Product Management related Dashboards and metrics

children.description: Contextualize trend of Traffic, Conversion & Demand to understand the % which is negated downstream in the form of Cancels, Returns
Cancels trended by reason code, division, vendor, class, price type.
Returns trended, by reason code, vendor, marketing channel, class, and depiction.
Pre-Order item transactional metrics. In this data set, pre-order is flagged once shipped.
